com.avaya.ic.sdk

Interface ChatMediaInteraction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MediaInteraction

    public interface ChatMediaInteraction
extends MediaInteraction
    Represents a chat interaction.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ChatMediaInteraction.DisplayTypingStatus
      Display or clear typing status message of the agent in the chat room.
      static class  ChatMediaInteraction.Mode
      Specifies the mode in which the supervisor can monitor a chat interaction.
      static class  ChatMediaInteraction.MonitoringStatusChanged
      Event to indicate whether supervisor is monitoring chat interaction or not
      static class  ChatMediaInteraction.Operation 
      static class  ChatMediaInteraction.TypingStatusChanged
      Event to indicate changed typing status message from other participants in the chat room.
      static class  ChatMediaInteraction.VisiblityModeChanged
      Event to indicate that supervisor visibility mode for Chat room has changed

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.avaya.ic.sdk.MediaInteraction

        MediaInteraction.OperationFailed, MediaInteraction.OperationSucceeded, MediaInteraction.ParentMediaChanged, MediaInteraction.PartyAdded, MediaInteraction.PartyDropped, MediaInteraction.State, MediaInteraction.StateChanged, MediaInteraction.Type

    • Method Detail

      • getDatawakeURL

        java.lang.String getDatawakeURL()
        Get The URL that allows access to the DataWake record.
        Returns:
        The URL that allows access to the DataWake record.

      • getTranscript

        TranscriptDocument getTranscript()
        Get The transcript of the messages exchanged between participants in the chat session.
        Returns:
        The transcript of the messages exchanged between participants in the chat session.

      • isCallbackRequested

        boolean isCallbackRequested()
        Get True if customer has requested for callback, by initiating Chat And Callback or WebSchedule Callback from IC website.
        Returns:
        True if customer has requested for callback, by initiating Chat And Callback or WebSchedule Callback from IC website.

      • isVoipRequested

        boolean isVoipRequested()
        Get True if customer has requested for callback, by initiating VOIP from IC website.
        Returns:
        True if customer has requested for callback, by initiating VOIP from IC website.

      • getCallbackNumber

        java.lang.String getCallbackNumber()
        Get The callback number, if customer has provided so.
        Returns:
        The callback number, if customer has provided so.

      • getVisibility

        ChatMediaInteraction.Mode getVisibility()
        Get The visiblity of the agent in chat room for this interaction.

        P.S. This value will be changed only if the logged in agent is supervising any chat interaction of some agent. In case of non-supervised interaction this value will always be true.
        Returns:
        The visiblity of the agent in chat room for this interaction.

        P.S. This value will be changed only if the logged in agent is supervising any chat interaction of some agent. In case of non-supervised interaction this value will always be true.

      • isMonitoring

        boolean isMonitoring()
        Get True if the supervisor is monitoring this chat, else false. When supervisor invokes monitor on this interaction, this will be set to return true. When supervisor un-monitors this interaction, this will be set to return false.
        Returns:
        True if the supervisor is monitoring this chat, else false. When supervisor invokes monitor on this interaction, this will be set to return true. When supervisor un-monitors this interaction, this will be set to return false.

      • getTypingStatusMessage

        java.lang.String getTypingStatusMessage()
        Get Typing status message from other participants in the chat room.
        Returns:
        Typing status message from other participants in the chat room.

      • pushURL

        void pushURL(java.lang.String url)
        Allows a user to send, or push, a URL to the other participants in the chat room.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL that the user wants to send to the other participants in the chat room.

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Sends the text of a chat message to the other participants in the chat room.
        Parameters:
        msg - A message to send to the other participants in the chat room.

      • setJoinUsHandle

        void setJoinUsHandle(java.lang.String handle)
        Requests the Chat server to tag the room with the join-us handle. This allows any customer escalation with that handle as the login-id to be routed to this particular chat room.
        An operation succeeded event will be raised, if handle was successful set, otherwise operation failed event will be raised.

        A MediaInteraction.OperationFailed event will be raised, if agent performing this operation is supervisor.
        Parameters:
        handle - The handle that will be tagged to the room.

      • setVisibility

        void setVisibility(ChatMediaInteraction.Mode visibility)
        If the supevisor wants to monitor this chat interaction in in-visible mode or visible mode, this API needs to be invoked. P.S. By default supervisor will always be invisible mode. Agents are by default set to visible.

        A MediaInteraction.OperationFailed event will be raised, if agent performing this operation is not a supervisor.
        Parameters:
        visibility - Mode in which the supervisor wants to monitor this interaction.

      • monitor

        void monitor()
        When the supervisor wants to monitor this interactions, this API should be invoked. By default, supervisor will be monitoring this chat interaction in invisible mode. In order to make change the mode, setVisibility API needs to be invoked with desired mode.

        A MediaInteraction.OperationFailed event will be raised, if agent performing this operation is not a supervisor.

      • unmonitor

        void unmonitor()
        When the supervisor wants to unmonitor this interactions, this API should be invoked. On invoking this API, supervisor will leave the chat room, thereby no tarnsripts will be received thereafter. If supervisor wishes to re-monitor this interaction, monitor API needs to invoked.

        A MediaInteraction.OperationFailed event will be raised, if agent performing this operation is not a supervisor

      • sendTypingStatus

        void sendTypingStatus(ChatMediaInteraction.DisplayTypingStatus display)
        Sends the typing status message of the agent to other participants in the chat room.
        Parameters:
        display - Display or clear typing status message of the agent in the chat room. Yes to display typing status message, No to clear typing status message.
